directions: Combine meatballs, mushroom soup, water, and sour cream. Cover and refrigerate overnight so that the meatballs can absorb the flavors.
Pour the mixture into a slow cooker and heat until the meatballs are heated through. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Meatballs and Sauce
